arts.sum: Inter Milan continues their Serie A campaign with a home fixture against Udinese at the iconic Giuseppe Meazza on Sunday, August 31st, 2025. After a strong start to the season, Inter will be looking to reclaim their position at the top of the table under the guidance of head coach Cristian Chivu.
